uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data

Class Report

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Report

  • public class Report
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates an "end-of-day" report detailing useful till information including total money taken, total number of orders and a detailed breakdown of all orders stored inside Order. Outputs and prints this report using a pre-defined HTML template to a '.html' file.
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Report(java.util.ArrayList<Order> orderArray, java.math.BigDecimal totalForDay, java.math.BigDecimal totalDiscountForDay, int totalOrders)
      Instantiates a new report.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exportReport(java.lang.String filePath, java.net.URI fileURI, boolean printReport)
      Outputs all till data obtained from Till, including financial data and a breakdown of all orders into a pre-defined HTML report, before loading the newly generated report into the system default web browser.
      int getNoOfOrders()
      Gets the total number of orders variable used by this class.
      java.util.ArrayList<Order> getReportArray()
      Gets the array of Order that is used by this class to output till data.

      Gets the total discount applied for the day variable used by this class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Report

        public Report(java.util.ArrayList<Order> orderArray,
      java.math.BigDecimal totalForDay,
      java.math.BigDecimal totalDiscountForDay,
      int totalOrders)
        Instantiates a new report. Retrieves the array list of Orders from Till as well as the the total amount of money taken, total discount applied, and total number of orders calculated by Till
        Parameters:
        orderArray - The array list of Order
        totalForDay - The total amount of money taken (Calculated by Till.getTotalForDay())
        totalDiscountForDay - The total discount applied (Calculated by Till.getTotalDiscountForDay())
        totalOrders - The total number of orders taken (Calculated by Till.getTotalNoOfOrders())

    • Method Detail

      • getReportArray

        public java.util.ArrayList<Order> getReportArray()
        Gets the array of Order that is used by this class to output till data.
        Returns:
        The array of Orders used by this class

        public java.math.BigDecimal getTotalForDay()
        Gets the total money taken for the day variable used by this class.
        Returns:

        public java.math.BigDecimal getTotalDiscountForDay()
        Gets the total discount applied for the day variable used by this class.
        Returns:
        The total discount for the day

      • getNoOfOrders

        public int getNoOfOrders()
        Gets the total number of orders variable used by this class.
        Returns:
        The total number of orders

      • exportReport

        public void exportReport(java.lang.String filePath,
                java.net.URI fileURI,
                boolean printReport)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Outputs all till data obtained from Till, including financial data and a breakdown of all orders into a pre-defined HTML report, before loading the newly generated report into the system default web browser. Sends the newly-created file to the printer using a dedicated thread.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        Print
